keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.
map e scrollPageUp
map h scrollPageUp
map l scrollPageDown
map <a-]> nextTab
map <a-[> previousTab
map ' Marks.activateGotoMode
map q removeTab
map Q restoreTab
searchEngines:
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia

# More examples.
#
# (Vimium supports search completion Wikipedia, as
# above, and for these.)
#
aw: https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php?search=%s Archwiki
yt: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
az: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
gh: https://github.com/search?q=%s GitHub
wa: http://www.wolframalpha.com/input/?i=%s Wolfram|Alpha
w: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special:Search?search=%s Wikipedia
